title: When do the next lot of Riot Mech Figures come out?

embed.description: The Riot Games merch store is here! Discover merch crafted to capture the spirit of League in every stitch and brushstroke, so you can carry a piece of your game wherever you go.

body: Just wondering when the next lot of figures come out, I've been waiting since the beginning of time for a Singed one to come out but it seems the are starting off with the most popular champs. If Riot could give us and answer that would be more than helpful.
